data.title: Medal of Honor Recipient
data.meta_description: U.S. Army Private Frank Miller was presented the Medal of Honor for military valor during the U.S. Civil War.
data.text:
Back

U.S. Civil War - U.S. Army

Frank Miller

Details

Rank: Private

Conflict/Era: U.S. Civil War

Unit/Command:

Company M,

2d New York Cavalry

Military Service Branch: U.S. Army

Medal of Honor Action Date: April 6, 1865

Medal of Honor Action Place: Deatonsville (Sailor's Creek), Virginia, USA

Citation

Capture of flag of 25th Battalion Virginia Infantry (C.S.A.); was taken prisoner, but successfully retained his trophy until recaptured.
